description:
In a not too distant future, a cybernetic game called Hero Battle allows users to download wearable fighting suits and compete in cyberspace. Fifth grader Goushou Kaito is one of many players, and he has one more reason to win the championship: the 10 billion Yen prize to pay the 10 billion debt on his shoulders.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
On the Earth in the near future, a cyber sport which takes place in an electrical-brain airspace, "Hero Bank" has gained popularity. The protagonist, Kaito Gosho, challenges someone to a hero battle to rescue his friend Nagare Amano, and then...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Clang Clang, Enter the Gold Appears!!
じゃりんじゃりん ￥ エンター・ザ・ゴールド登場!!

REGULAR.description:
Kaito has been burdened with a ten billion yen debt in exchange for Enter the Gold. Big Money Company`s Mitsuo Zaizen and Fukuta Kanemaru, and his sister Ai Gosho are in a panic! However, Kaito declares with sunny luminance that he`ll pay back the debt. Then, Nagare makes a certain proposal. "I want to have a hero battle with you."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Sniping Cleanup Nagare Amano`s Determination!!
スナイプ大そうじ ￥ 天野ナガレの決意!!

REGULAR.description:
The prize is an astounding ten billion yen! Enthusiastic to take the championship and repay his debt in full, Kaito had planned to participate with his comrades from the Big Money Company, but cannot pay the 10,000 yen entry fee.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aim for Ten Billion Yen! The Hero Wars Curtain Rises!!
めざせ100億円 ￥ ヒーローウォーズ開幕!!

REGULAR.description:
With it decided that they will participate in the Big Money Hero Wars, Kaito and the others have their eyes on breaking through the preliminaries. But first, Kaito heads to his familiar barber to get some upkeep on his regent hairdo. However, a new beauty salon has stolen his customers and driven him to close shop.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Perilous! Kaito`s Regent!
危うし ￥ カイトのリーゼント!!

REGULAR.description:
Kaito and gang arrive at Big Money Bay to catch some fish for dinner where they meet the third heir to "The Fish Samurai Shop," the oldest shop in the Big Money Fresh Fish Market Castle: Isshin Uminari. The two of them immediately hit it off, but when they learn they are both in the Hero Wars, they clash in a Hero Battle! Whose passion will burn brightest!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Burst Angler! A Meeting with Piscesamurai!!
爆釣り ￥ ウオザムライ見参!!

REGULAR.description:
A rival appears for Big Money Company! Lead by Hana Akinai, their name is "Money-grubbing Corporation." Hana has cultivated the girl`s "Detention Club," where they study with their clients into a huge success. Since Kaito hates to lose this gets his competitive streak all fired up. He starts the "Big Money Detention Club," but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Detention Panic! Black Cat Shadow Kitty!!
居残り大パニック ￥ 黒猫シャドーキティ!!

REGULAR.description:
Big Money Company shows up at to help pick tea at the plantation owned by Fukuta`s relatives to earn a reward. The manual labor is harder than they expect, leaving them dripping in sweat, and they experience just how hard it is to earn money. What should be a small issue turns into a huge fight due to Nagare being absent from his cram school training camp. If it`s come to this, better settle it with a Hero Battle!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Money Company Breakup! Tea Picking Battle Royale!
ガッポリカンパニー解散 ￥ おちゃつみバトルロイヤル!!

REGULAR.description:
Nagare kept quiet to Kaito and had been participating in the Hero Wars. What`s more, he closed a contract with the mysterious character calling himself the Money Ghost and obtained a mighty power. The three others in Big Money Company are shocked. Nagare vanishes and is eliminated from everyone else`s memories. This is when a mysterious email reaches Kaito...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Blue Impact! The Dominion Dollar!!
蒼い衝撃 ￥ ザ・ドミニオン・ダラー!!

REGULAR.description:
Kaito is shocked by his parting with Nagare and loses his energy. Sennen gives him a pep talk, and Kaito commences special training to get back Nagare! Shishio Torai volunteers, but only offers useless crash courses, so Kaito heads to a seminar that states it will "teach the crux to guaranteed victory in Hero Battles!" There they find people complaining that they`ve been cheated...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Looks Like a Traveler in Trouble!
燃え上がれ ￥ 豪勝カイトの大特訓!!

REGULAR.description:
Kaito and gang hit the top prize in the shopping district lottery and go to a hot spring hotel. For some reason, Hana and her friends are there at the hotel in waitress uniforms. Also, from what they can see, a seemingly evil land prospector appears and presses the hostess to eviction. Kaito`s Bankfon has broken, but he borrows everyone`s sentiments and Hero Suits, and challenges him to a Hero Battle with the hotel on the line!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Protect It! Steamy Hot Springs Job Switch Shock!!
守れ ￥ 温泉旅館テンショック!!

REGULAR.description:
Isn`t there some quick and easy way to get stronger? One of Platina`s prophecies zaps in just as Kaito is thinking that. It appears a fortune teller will be instrumental to everyone getting stronger. When it comes to fortune tellers, it has to be Platina! Kaito and the others give Platina the VIP treatment, but Fukuta isn`t pleased...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 100 Bullseyes out of 100! A Big Riot at the Fortune-Telling Battle, Though!!
百発百チューッ ￥ 占いバトルで大騒動だケド!!

REGULAR.description:
Kaito and the others make their way to Iron Town to get a refrigerator fixed. There they meet Tetsunosuke "Kintetsu" Kanagata. Kaito adores the chivalrous and lively Kintetsu whose body is half machine, but it turns out he too is a fight leader who entered the Hero Wars to pay off Iron Town`s debt!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Man of Steel! Kintetsu!
鋼の漢[おとこ] ￥ キンテツ!!

REGULAR.description:
Kaito beat Kintetsu, but the debt repayment period for Iron Town has lapsed and the factory is being demolished. At the command is the president of Cyber Emperor: Deborah Kizaki. Kaito challenges Deborah to a battle waging Iron Town on a Gamble Rule. Deborah accepts and says he will take Enter the Gold if he is victorious.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Flash Descent! Deborah Kizaki!!
キラッと降臨 ￥ デボラ貴崎!!

REGULAR.description:
Kaito is defeated by Deborah and has Enter the Gold taken away. Or so he thinks, until that very moment Sennen barges in and overrides the battle. Kaito is publicly criticized and eager to have another match with him, but Sennen tells him he can`t win unless he recatalogs Enter the Gold`s hidden power.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Trillion Swiftness! Enter the Speed!!
兆神速 ￥ エンター・ザ・スピード!!

REGULAR.description:
Kaito is victorious against Deborah with Enter the Speed and is set to appear in the Big Money Hero Wars finals. Isshin, Hana, as well as Nagare make it through the first round. Kaito heads into his fated first round for the ten billion yen prize, the right to challenge the champion Ryouta Arashimaya, and most importantly, to get Nagare back!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Off-Site Sprint! Catch up, Overtake, Uproot!!
場外疾走 ￥ 追いつけ追いこせ引っこぬけ!!

REGULAR.description:
A transfer student comes to Kaito`s class. His name is Li-Chi Long, a curt boy they met at the Big Money Hero Wars finals opening ceremony. Kaito takes a liking to him and half pushes Long into joining Big Money Company and treats him to his grandfather, Zouan Gosho`s, pickled plums. Long begins to open up to Kaito`s inherent cheerfulness bit by bit, however...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Stormy Transfer Student! Li-Chi Long!!
波乱の転校生 ￥ 龍里千!!

REGULAR.description:
Long, who was accepted as Big Money Company`s Vice President, was actually a spy sent by the Money Ghost. Kaito heads into round two of the Hero Wars none the wiser. His opponent is so dull he believes he will win an overwhelming victory and uses Explosive Gold Rush right off the bat. However, an unforeseen "bug" occurs, and he might be in big trouble!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 2回戦 ￥ 大人は大人で大変なんだ!!
Round 2! Adults Have Their Own Big Problems!!

REGULAR.description:
The Money Ghost`s plan ends in failure. Long is sure the fact he`s a spy has been discovered and readies himself, but Kaito and the others don`t even suspect him! Kaito`s belief that smiles are free lights a fire in Long`s heart, and his flames of revenge flicker. All the while, Kaito`s third match begins! His opponent is the mysterious assassin, Rohan Yuri.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Heavy Attire! The Dostorbrewski!!
重装 ￥ ザ・ドストルーブルスキー!!

REGULAR.description:
Hana advances after a favorable win, but her next opponent is none other than Li-Chi Long. Kaito isn`t sure who to cheer for knowing that he will fight the winner in the semifinals. On top of it all, Kaito is puzzled when Sennen tells him that Long is from the same circle as Deborah and Rohan. Kaito declares that Long is his friend. What decision will Long make?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Merciless! The All-powerful Ura Dragon`s Rampage!!
冷酷無残 ￥ ザ・ムゲン・ウラドラ暴走!!

REGULAR.description:
Long takes out Hana with overwhelming force, then bids farewell to Kaito and disappears just like Nagare had. Mitsuo and Fukuta say they`ve been tricked, but Kaito insists that`s not the case.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Drastic Measures! Nagare vs. Isshin!!
一刀両断 ￥ ナガレVS一心!!

REGULAR.description:
Nagare defeats Isshin and assures himself a place in the finals. The next semifinal is Kaito VS Li-Chi Long, but Kaito is hesitant to fight Long, who he thought was his friend. Zouan can`t just watch and gives Kaito a push, saying "Don`t think, just move your body." Kaito`s doubts allayed, he decides to take on Long for real! The curtain rises on their passionate fight!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Semifinal! Even If You`re Broke, Smiles Are Free!!
準決勝 ￥ 金がなくてもニッコリ0円!!

REGULAR.description:
Nagare inhumanely deletes Long after Kaito defeats him. Why did Nagare change? Kaito keeps the lesson Ai learned from their father in his heart and confronts his final opponent, Nagare Amano. Will he be able to take back his close friend and member of Big Money Company? They clash in an intense battle. Who will remain standing at the end?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Final Round! Gold VS Dominion!!
決勝戦 ￥ ゴールドVSドニミオン!!

REGULAR.description:
Kaito somehow manages to triumph over Nagare. He takes possession of the ten billion yen prize and the right to challenge the champion, Ryouta Arashiyama. When Nagare is taken to the hospital, Kaito swears to have such an amazing battle it will open his eyes, and finally challenges the champion! Elsewhere, Sennen and Hikari are acting vigilant behind the scenes...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Battle of the Century! Challenge Segalion!!
世紀の一戦 ￥ 挑めセガリオン!!

REGULAR.description:
The Money Ghost, a.k.a. Adachi, finally starts to overwrite the world with Nagare as the "key." Money disappears from Big Money District, and he declares "If you wish to stop me, come to the Underbank!" as the Megalion army digitizes the real world. Kaito breaks into the Underbank to stop the world from being overwritten and to save Nagare!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cash Extinction! The Money Ghost`s Counterattack!!
現金消滅 ￥ マネーゴーストの逆襲!!

REGULAR.description:
The Money Ghost, who laid in wait in the Underbank, torments Kaito with the strongest Hero Suit, "The End of Money." Kaito somehow seizes victory with an Explosive Gold Rush! Or so he thinks, when the Money Ghost`s Hero Suit transforms into "The Apocalypse"?! Then a miracle occurs when Enter the Gold is driven into a corner...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mega Explosive Birth! Enter the Hero!!
兆爆誕 ￥ エンター・ザ・ヒーロー!!

REGULAR.description:
Kaito takes down Adachi with Enter the Gold`s power and comes to Nagare`s rescue, who has been taken captive in the depths of the Underbank. Nagare loses his sense of self, evolves into Justice Dollar, and attacks Kaito!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Conclusion! The First and Last Big Brawl!!
決着 ￥ 最初で最後の大ゲンカ!!

REGULAR.description:
Three months have passed since the Adachi Incident. Big Money Company becomes famous overnight for saving the world. Kaito and Nagare`s best friend tag-team is a huge hit. One day, the foulmouthed piglet Boochokkin appears from Kaito`s bankfon, the Tower of Seizure falls from the sky, and a mysterious young man who carries a basketball takes the stage! Is another crisis imminent for Kaito and the others?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Money Fairy! Boochokkin Ka-ching!!
お金の妖精 ￥ ブーチョッキンじゃきん!!

REGULAR.description:
The mysterious young man who saves Kaito and the others arrives as a transfer student. His name is Sekito Sakuraba, and he seems to know about the black Hero Suits and the Tower of Seizure. Nagare asks him, "Who in the world are you?" Then, the Tower of Seizure once again falls from the sky, and Kaito and Nagare fight the black Hero Suits as a tag-team...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Friend or Foe?! Sekito Sakuraba!!
敵か味方か ￥ 桜田セキト!!

REGULAR.description:
The Tower of Seizure falls on top of Nagare and Kaito faints after he tries to save him. According to Hikari, the Tower of Seizure converts anything of monetary value into data and absorbs it, so Nagare has been digitized and taken away, but is safe. Just as Kaito becomes relieved to hear that, a grim looking man by the name of Ryuuga Tennouji makes landfall where Isshin resides: Big Money Bay!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Money Is Power! Ryuuga Tennouji Makes Landfall!!
ゼニこそ力 ￥ 天王寺龍牙上陸!!

REGULAR.description:
Kaito is vexed about what`s happened and plants himself on the toilet. He was saved by Sekito yet again just before he was about to lose to Ryuuga. Just then, the prime minister, Musaku Nagata, and secretary of the Cyber Bureau, Asuka Yagami, appear on the scene! Massive Towers of Seizure have fallen at seven different locations all over Japan. Ryuuga`s seven man group known as "The Seven Gods of Suits" appear in a giant pirate ship and declare that Japan is now under their control!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Take Down the Seven Gods of Suits! Kaito`s a Special Agent!!
倒せ七服神 ￥ カイトは特命エージェント!!

REGULAR.description:
Kaito and gang take a business trip using the Warp Machine "Snuffed Out" to Osaka, the city of laughs, in order to beat Ryuuga of the Seven Gods of Suits! Under Ryuuga`s control, Osaka has rule where following up a joke with a retort incurs a tax and punishment.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Osaka Business Trip! That Man Is Taiga!!
大阪シュッチョー ￥ その男, 大河!!

REGULAR.description:
Kaito and the others are mistaken for enemies by Taiga and escape by warping through the toilet. They arrive in Kochi of all places! There they meet Turtle Company`s Ryouma Ishin. Big Money Company promises to defeat Hyouri Aimu, the member of the Seven Gods of Suits who controls Shikoku, on the condition Ryouma resolves their misunderstanding with Taiga.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Business Partnership! It`s Ryouma Ishin!!
業務提携 ￥ 維新漁馬ぜよ!!

REGULAR.description:
Sennen installs a reinforcement program for Enter the Gold so that Kaito can overthrow Ryuuga. Kaito returns to Osaka with Ryouma and meets Taiga once again. Taiga is stubborn and doesn`t trust Kaito`s invitation to defeat Ryuuga together.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ultra Evolution! Enter the Prize!!
兆進化 ￥ エンター・ザ・プライズ!!

REGULAR.description:
The coalition between Kaito, with his evolved Enter the Prize, and Taiga lasts very briefly before Fukuta is kidnapped by Deborah Kizaki, who has gotten in close with Ryuuga behind the scenes. Taiga proposes a Gamble Rule with Fukuta on the line.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Searing Hot Revenge! Kaito vs. Ryuuga!!
激熱リベンジ ￥ カイトVS龍牙!!

REGULAR.description:
Kaito and the others come back to Big Money District for the first time in ages to a big surprise: Shishio Torai has become the prime minister! Ai and Zouan follow him obediently for fear of his overbearing behavior and the punishments for disobeying his laws. When Kaito and gang learn what is going on and rebel, Torai ups the ante even further! He holds an emergency press conference and makes a startling announcement!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Absolute Obedience! Do as Torai-sama Says!!
絶対服従 ￥ 虎井様の言う通り!!

REGULAR.description:
An SOS arrives from the Okinawan resistance, and Kaito and company take a business trip to Okinawa! Everyone is in the mood to sightsee, likely because Ai has tagged along. Then, they all hear some strange sound, and Ai, Fukuta, and Mitsuo lay their desires bare and transform into money zombies! Danjirou Sastuma of the resistance movement, and the mysterious masked janitor "Justice Star" show up to help!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Okinawa Business Trip! The Money of the Dead!!
沖縄シュッチョー ￥ マネー・オブ・ザ・デッド!!

REGULAR.description:
Kaito and Sekito escape from Bukimi and hide at the Yours Truly Company secret base while they wait for Nanten Minami to complete the anti-Resort Virus vaccine.  Ai and Danjirou, brainwashed, appear there and launch an attack! Kaito and Sekito manage to get away thanks to Justice Star, but Kaito begins to show symptoms of turning into a money zombie...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Strongest Tag-team Formation! Kaito and Sekito!!
最強タッグ結成 ￥ カイト&セキト!!

REGULAR.description:
An SOS arrives from Momiji Kurenai, and Big Money Company takes a business trip to Hiroshima! Their enemy this time is the lone female member of the Seven Gods of Suits, Benten Kureha. She seems to be plotting to use the money she has ripped off from everyone for something crazy. Kaito and gang head to the Tower of Bibel to infiltrate Benten`s host computer system, but a number of traps await them inside!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hiroshima Business Trip! Honorless Money Battle!!
広島シュッチョー ￥ 仁義なきマネーバトル!!

REGULAR.description:
Kaito and gang get incredibly close to capturing Benten, but ultimately fail due to Momiji Kurenai, an enemy spy. Their next strategy is an ambush on the Tower of Seizure. The group heads to Kureha Shrine, where the Tower of Seizure stands, but as they attempt to carry out their plan, the tower transforms into the giant robot, King Benten! Can they save Hiroshima from its rampage?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Seizure Robo! King Benten!!
差押えロボ ￥ 弁天王!!

REGULAR.description:
This time it`s a business trip to Nagoya. There, they are greeted by Hokosu Shachi, the member of the Seven Gods of Suits forcing everyone to cut back in rash ways. When confronted, Hokosu says, "If you beat me, I`ll let you take my daughter!" The fight proceeds with a special rule where you gain battle money by proposing good ways to be frugal. Kaito is useless this time around, so Mitsuo takes his place and joins the battle with his eye on marrying into riches!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Frugality Is Justice! The Nagoya Cheapskate Battle!!
節約や正義 ￥ 名古屋ドケチ決戦!!

REGULAR.description:
An emergency develops! All of the toilets in Big Money District have been frozen. Big Money Company panics: they can`t use the toilet warp like this! Justice Star appears and tells them Himuro Touki of the Seven Gods of Suits is behind this scheme. Kaito and gang catch a ride on Ryouma`s ship and take a business trip to Tohoku, where Himuro resides!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: To Tohoku! Toilet Recovery Mission!!
いざ東北へ ￥ トイレ奪還作戦!!

REGULAR.description:
Due to enemy interference, their ship explodes! Kaito and the others are expelled from cyberspace and are scattered across Tohoku. Mitsuo, Fukuta, Boochokkin, and Ryouma join up and search for Kaito. Then a mysterious ghost appears and everyone panics! Elsewhere, Nagare discovers Sekito passed out, and then Himuro appears...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Castaways! Big Money Company Assemble!!
漂流 ￥ 集まれガッポリカンパニー!!

REGULAR.description:
Kaito has finally been found, but he`s lost his memory! He is taken back to Big Money District for the time being, but everyone is thrown through a loop when Kaito actually flushes the toilet, doesn`t stick his butt in people`s faces, and even starts speaking politely. Suddenly, Kyousuke Kakei, the strongest man in the Seven Gods of Suits shows up! Left with no choice, Sekito and friends accept his challenge.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Shock! Kaito Has Amnesia!!
Shock: Kaito wa Kiokusoushitsu!!
ショック ￥ カイトは記憶喪失!!

REGULAR.description:
Kakei`s fierce attack leaves Kaito in a tight spot, and Himuro shelters him in a rift in cyberspace. He lands in the "cyber spirit world" which is composed of the malice of money-hungry fight leaders!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cyber Spirit World! The Kaito Rescue Mission!!
電脳霊界 ￥ カイト救出大作戦!!

REGULAR.description:
Kaito is saved by Sekito and safely returns from the cyber spirit world only to be swamped by crowds of people. Mitsuo recognizes this as a business opportunity and starts "Kaito`s Supernatural Consultation Center," and it`s a big success!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Best of the Best! The Prize Yen Dragon!!
チョージョージョー ￥ プライズ・￥・ドラゴン!!

REGULAR.description:
Sekito Sakurada has just started to fit in at Big Money Company. The others prepare a matching business card for him, but his position hasn`t yet been decided.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Promotion! What Is Sekito the Head of?!
昇進 ￥ セキトはいったい何部長!?

REGULAR.description:
Kakei destroyed the Gosho home and kidnapped Sekito! Kaito and gang head for the casino tower where Kakei awaits, but the five Seven Gods of Suits` Hero Suits they previously defeated are being pitted against Sekito.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Risky Battle! Rescue Sekito Sakurada!!
リスキーバトル ￥ 桜田セキトを救い出せ!!

REGULAR.description:
Kaito has saved Sekito, and now he challenges Kyousuke Kakei, the last of the Seven Gods of Suits, to a Hero Battle. Kakei suggests they wager something: their lives!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Last of the Seven Gods of Suits! The Risky Life!!
最後の七服神 ￥ リスキー・ザ・人生!!

REGULAR.description:
Asuka Yagami, the Cyber Bureau secretary, was manipulating the Seven Gods of Suits behind the scenes all along! Yagami, who has transcended the barrier between real and digital, erects the Tower of Bankruptcy at the capitol and generates "money tornadoes" which begin to transform everything in Japan into money.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Astonishing! Butt-naked in a Money Tornado!!
仰天 ￥ マネートルネードでスッポンポン!!

REGULAR.description:
The Missiles of Seizure fire! While money typhoons are changing everything in the world into money, Kaito and gang head for cyberspace to stop Yagami with the legendary ten yen coins. However, the Prize Yen Dragon and Cosmic Dollar Dragon are helpless against Yagami. Just when all seems lost, the sun and moon`s priceless friendship creates a miracle!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Union of Friendship! The Yen-Dollar Million!!
友情合体 ￥ ジ・エンドル・ミリオン!!

REGULAR.description:
Yagami steals and absorbs everyone`s Hero Suits including Credit Loan Wolf and transforms into his strongest form: The Phoenix Wolf! Kaito fights with everyone`s hopes planted on his shoulders, and Sekito attempts to carry out his mission.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Smiles Are Free! We Are Big Money Company!!
ニッコリ0円 ￥ 俺たちはガッポリカンパニー!!
Opening 1
Opening 2
Ending 1
Ending 2
PV
Hero Bank
ヒーローバンク
英雄银行
Herobank
